ygData.subject: Re: feign death
ygData.msgSnippet: Practice is the only way to make it more reliable. you will learn how and when to use it. You can almost always use it as I have not found any mobs that will
ygData.messageBody:
Practice is the only way to make it more reliable. you will learn how and
when to use it. You can almost always use it as I have not found any mobs
that will not be fooled by it but you cant forget the mobs that will run
back /q is very good for these situations.

Kizmet Bayashi
40th level monk
E-Marr
Da`Kor


----- Original Message -----
From: <CLMarkley@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 12:18 PM
Subject: [EQ-Monks] feign death


> From: CLMarkley@...
>
> I just got the skill, and used all my practices to max it. Now i was
> wondering if anyone has any tips as hhow to make it work more reliably,
and a
> list of the types of (or individual) mobs that can see through it.
>
> >
